pageContext.claim: “More broadly, there's much we can do to bring our nation together. For example, those engaged in the political arena must stop treating political opponents as being morally defective. Have to do that. The language of moral condemnation and destructive routine, these are arguments and disagreements that have to stop.”
pageContext.analysis: These are fine sentiments, but Trump violates them at every campaign rally when talking about Democrats. So we have included this statement in our database as it is an example of extreme hypocrisy.
